typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		hash_bus_key as string,
		work_category as string,
		effective_date as timestamp,
		work_category_description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 derive(effective_date = addMonths(effective_date,12),
		insert_date = currentTimestamp()) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 keyGenerate(output({Surrogate Key} as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
